name: BitesizeUX: Complete a Beginner UX Project in 30 Minutes
description:
Ready to create a UX project in just 30 minutes?

We’ve created this project template file for you to follow along with this free online workshop, and create an amazing portfolio project to show off!


How to Use this Template

  1. Check out the FREE 30 minute UX Workshop here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wN7ThtueEpM
  2. Make a duplicate of this template to add your work and follow along.


About this Workshop

In this beginner friendly workshop, we’ll design an app called CleanUp, that helps people find local volunteer events in their community.


Your instructor, Joe Formica (Springboard Partner, and Founder of Bitesize UX) will guide you step-by-step through the key parts of the UX design process, along with all the tools, templates, and activities you’ll need to get hands-on design experience.


Interested in launching a career in UX design?

Springboard offers a variety of career-ready courses with 1:1 mentorship, industry projects, career support, and deep dives into all areas of UX.


Save $1000 on your enrollment by using promo code BITESIZEUXSB1000 for UI/UX Design Career Track or the UX Design Career Track
